press_machine_button.description: Press the button to turn on/off the coffee machine.

rotate_machine_knob.description: Rotate the knob to adjust coffee machine settings.

rotate_portafilter.description: Rotate the portafilter handle to secure it in the coffee machine.

clean_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine including the button, knob, portafilter, and body.

clean_machine_body.description: Clean the coffee machine body to remove any stains or coffee particles.

clean_machine_button_knob.description: Clean the coffee machine's button and knob for proper functioning.

clean_portafilter.description: Clean the portafilter regularly to avoid coffee build-up and for optimal coffee flavor.
